query:
SELECT id as "id!: i32", 
account_id as "account_id!: String", 
managed_by_admin as "managed_by_admin!: bool", 
managed_unit_amount as "managed_unit_amount!: Option < i32 >", 
stripe_session_url as "stripe_session_url!: Option < String >", 
stripe_session_id as "stripe_session_id!: Option < String >", 
advertiser_addr as "advertiser_addr!: String", 
status as "status!: CampaignStatus", 
briefing_hash as "briefing_hash!: String", 
briefing_json as "briefing_json!: String", 
budget as "budget!: String", 
price_per_point as "price_per_point!: String", 
max_individual_reward as "max_individual_reward!: String", 
min_individual_reward as "min_individual_reward!: String", 
thumbs_up_only as "thumbs_up_only!: bool", 
valid_until as "valid_until!: Option < UtcDateTime >", 
report_hash as "report_hash!: Option < String >", 
created_at as "created_at!: UtcDateTime", 
force_hydrate as "force_hydrate!: bool", 
total_collabs as "total_collabs!: i32", 
total_spent as "total_spent!: String", 
total_budget as "total_budget!: String", 
impression_count as "impression_count!: i32", 
reply_count as "reply_count!: i32", 
repost_count as "repost_count!: i32", 
like_count as "like_count!: i32" FROM campaigns WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR id = ANY(CAST($4 as int4[])) ) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR account_id = $6::varchar) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR managed_by_admin = $8::boolean) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR managed_unit_amount = $10::int4) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR managed_unit_amount > $12::int4) AND (NOT $13::boolean OR managed_unit_amount < $14::int4) AND (NOT $15::boolean OR stripe_session_url = $16::varchar) AND (NOT $17::boolean OR stripe_session_id = $18::varchar) AND (NOT $19::boolean OR advertiser_addr = $20::varchar) AND (NOT $21::boolean OR advertiser_addr LIKE $22::varchar) AND (NOT $23::boolean OR status = $24::campaign_status) AND (NOT $25::boolean OR status != $26::campaign_status) AND (NOT $27::boolean OR briefing_hash = $28::varchar) AND (NOT $29::boolean OR briefing_hash LIKE $30::varchar) AND (NOT $31::boolean OR briefing_json = $32::varchar) AND (NOT $33::boolean OR briefing_json LIKE $34::varchar) AND (NOT $35::boolean OR budget = $36::varchar) AND (NOT $37::boolean OR budget > $38::varchar) AND (NOT $39::boolean OR budget < $40::varchar) AND (NOT $41::boolean OR price_per_point = $42::varchar) AND (NOT $43::boolean OR max_individual_reward = $44::varchar) AND (NOT $45::boolean OR min_individual_reward = $46::varchar) AND (NOT $47::boolean OR thumbs_up_only = $48::boolean) AND (NOT $49::boolean OR valid_until = $50::timestamptz) AND (NOT $51::boolean OR report_hash = $52::varchar) AND (NOT $53::boolean OR created_at = $54::timestamptz) AND (NOT $55::boolean OR created_at > $56::timestamptz) AND (NOT $57::boolean OR force_hydrate = $58::boolean) AND (NOT $59::boolean OR total_collabs = $60::int4) AND (NOT $61::boolean OR total_spent = $62::varchar) AND (NOT $63::boolean OR total_budget = $64::varchar) AND (NOT $65::boolean OR impression_count = $66::int4) AND (NOT $67::boolean OR reply_count = $68::int4) AND (NOT $69::boolean OR repost_count = $70::int4) AND (NOT $71::boolean OR like_count = $72::int4) ORDER BY 
      (CASE ($73 = 'Id' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'Id' AND $74) WHEN true THEN id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'AccountId' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN account_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'AccountId' AND $74) WHEN true THEN account_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'ManagedByAdmin' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN managed_by_admin ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'ManagedByAdmin' AND $74) WHEN true THEN managed_by_admin ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'ManagedUnitAmount' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN managed_unit_amount ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'ManagedUnitAmount' AND $74) WHEN true THEN managed_unit_amount ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'StripeSessionUrl' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN stripe_session_url ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'StripeSessionUrl' AND $74) WHEN true THEN stripe_session_url ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'StripeSessionId' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN stripe_session_id ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'StripeSessionId' AND $74) WHEN true THEN stripe_session_id ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'AdvertiserAddr' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN advertiser_addr ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'AdvertiserAddr' AND $74) WHEN true THEN advertiser_addr ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'Status' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN status ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'Status' AND $74) WHEN true THEN status ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'BriefingHash' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN briefing_hash ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'BriefingHash' AND $74) WHEN true THEN briefing_hash ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'BriefingJson' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN briefing_json ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'BriefingJson' AND $74) WHEN true THEN briefing_json ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'Budget' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN budget ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'Budget' AND $74) WHEN true THEN budget ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'PricePerPoint' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN price_per_point ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'PricePerPoint' AND $74) WHEN true THEN price_per_point ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'MaxIndividualReward' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN max_individual_reward ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'MaxIndividualReward' AND $74) WHEN true THEN max_individual_reward ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'MinIndividualReward' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN min_individual_reward ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'MinIndividualReward' AND $74) WHEN true THEN min_individual_reward ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'ThumbsUpOnly' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN thumbs_up_only ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'ThumbsUpOnly' AND $74) WHEN true THEN thumbs_up_only ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'ValidUntil' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN valid_until ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'ValidUntil' AND $74) WHEN true THEN valid_until ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'ReportHash' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN report_hash ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'ReportHash' AND $74) WHEN true THEN report_hash ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'CreatedAt' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'CreatedAt' AND $74) WHEN true THEN created_at ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'ForceHydrate' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN force_hydrate ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'ForceHydrate' AND $74) WHEN true THEN force_hydrate ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'TotalCollabs' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN total_collabs ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'TotalCollabs' AND $74) WHEN true THEN total_collabs ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'TotalSpent' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN total_spent ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'TotalSpent' AND $74) WHEN true THEN total_spent ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'TotalBudget' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN total_budget ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'TotalBudget' AND $74) WHEN true THEN total_budget ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'ImpressionCount' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN impression_count ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'ImpressionCount' AND $74) WHEN true THEN impression_count ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'ReplyCount' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN reply_count ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'ReplyCount' AND $74) WHEN true THEN reply_count ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'RepostCount' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN repost_count ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'RepostCount' AND $74) WHEN true THEN repost_count ELSE NULL END) DESC
    ,
      (CASE ($73 = 'LikeCount' AND NOT $74) WHEN true THEN like_count ELSE NULL END),
      (CASE ($73 = 'LikeCount' AND $74) WHEN true THEN like_count ELSE NULL END) DESC
     LIMIT $75 OFFSET $76 FOR UPDATE
